entry.data:

LOWS IN THE MID 50S
SOUTHWEST WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH WITH GUSTS UP TO 25 MPH

SUNNY
HIGHS AROUND 70
SOUTHWEST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

CLEAR IN THE EVENING, THEN BECOMING PARTLY CLOUDY

SUNNY, COOLER WITH HIGHS IN THE MID 50S
WEST WINDS 15 TO 20 MPH WITH GUSTS UP TO 30 MPH

MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS IN THE MID 30S
WEST WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH

MOSTLY CLEAR IN THE EVENING, THEN BECOMING PARTLY CLOUDY

PARTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 40S

MOSTLY CLEAR IN THE EVENING, THEN BECOMING PARTLY CLOUDY

HIGHS IN THE LOWER 60S
